Hero.title1: DELIVERY OF CARS FROM THE USA — TURNKEY SOLUTION
Hero.subtitle: Selection, inspection, purchase, delivery and customs clearance — all in one place

item1.title: UNIVERSAL WAREHOUSE
item1.text: A reliable partner in the world of cars from the USA.

item2.title: > 10 years of experience
item2.text: Our many years of experience partnering with leading auctions make us your reliable guide in the world of cars from America.

item3.title: Satisfied customers
item3.text: We are proud that our customers come back to us and recommend our services to their friends and partners.

AboutUs.title: OUR ADVANTAGES
AboutUs.honestyText: We put transparency and trust first: no hidden fees or unexpected conditions. You know all the details before signing the contract.
AboutUs.trustText: We operate exclusively within the legal framework: official agreements, transparent payment, and a full set of supporting documents.
AboutUs.legalityText: Thanks to our many years of experience, we know how to make the process of selecting, checking, and delivering a car as convenient and reliable as possible for our customers.
AboutUs.experienceText: We clearly agree on the final cost of the car. For you, this means confidence: no additional payments will appear during the process.
AboutUs.fixedPriceText: No hidden costs or unexpected charges. We guarantee fair deals without unpleasant surprises.
AboutUs.confidenceText: We work only with trusted logistics companies and auctions so you get your car safely and without risks.

AboutIntro.aboutIntroText:
Universal Warehouse is your reliable partner in the world of US cars.
We know all the ins and outs of working with American auctions and markets and provide a transparent and secure delivery process. Thanks to the experience of our experts, you get access to a wide selection of cars and support in choosing a vehicle that will be a profitable investment and a real pleasure for you.

ContactForm.subtitle: Our auto expert will contact you shortly to clarify important points, advise you, and help you make your choice.
ContactForm.name: Name

step1.title: COOPERATING WITH LEADING AMERICAN AUCTIONS — Copart, IAAI, and Manheim
step1.text: This gives our customers access to a huge range of cars: from affordable budget options to premium models. We thoroughly understand the rules and specifics of each platform, so we help you avoid unexpected costs and hidden risks.

step2.title: CONVENIENT TOOLS FOR SELECTING AND CHECKING VEHICLES
step2.text: Thanks to our innovative tools, you can quickly find the right vehicle and get a complete picture of its history and technical condition. Detailed reports before purchase guarantee confidence in your choice and help you find the right car for you — one that suits your lifestyle and budget.

step3.title: ORGANIZATION OF DELIVERY AND TURNKEY DOCUMENTATION
step3.text: We take care of the entire logistics cycle: from transporting the car from the US to a Ukrainian port, customs clearance and preparation of the necessary documents, to final delivery to the customer. The customer receives a ready-to-drive car without unnecessary bureaucracy and wasted time.

step4.title: CONSULTATIONS AND SUPPORT
step4.text: We take care of the entire logistics cycle: from transporting the car from the US to a Ukrainian port, customs clearance and preparation of the necessary documents, to final delivery to the customer. The customer receives a ready-to-drive car without unnecessary bureaucracy and wasted time.

experience.title: EXPERIENCE AND EXPERTISE
experience.text: We have been working in the US car market for over 10 years. Our team knows all the ins and outs of auctions, logistics, and customs clearance.

partners.title: RELIABLE PARTNERS
partners.text: We work exclusively with trusted auctions — Copart, IAAI, Manheim. This guarantees honesty, transparency, and quality transactions.

services.title: FULL SERVICE CYCLE
services.text: We take care of the entire process: from selecting a car and checking its history to delivery and all the formalities that ensure the car is ready for use. All you have to do is get behind the wheel and enjoy the ride.

transparency.title: TRANSPARENCY AND CONTROL
transparency.text: Our customers get full access to reports: repair history, mileage, insurance claims. You always know what you are buying.

wholesale.title: WHOLESALE TERMS
wholesale.text: We create profitable solutions for businesses and wholesale customers. A flexible cooperation system helps you save even more.

support.title: 24/7 SUPPORT
support.text: Our team is always available, ready to answer all your questions and accompany you every step of the way.
